_header: Almighty god grant to our king
Subjects: prayers, for the nation; Kings of England
_description: Brief prayer for good government — two couplets

Banna.Transcription:
almichty god grant till our kingSic grace þat he in vertew
                    ringSa þat this realme ay gydit bewith Iustice peax and
                    equite
Banna.Note: Second occurrence in MS; immediately follows 5112 and precedes 513.
Banna.Facsimiles:
Fox,  Denton,  and  William A. Ringler.  
             The Bannatyne Manuscript: National Library of Scotland Advocates’
                MS. 1.1.6
         London: Scolar Press, in Association with The National Library of
            Scotland, 1980.
